content:
Hi, I have used FHIR validator recently.
And result shows that : Invalid byte 1 of 1-byte UTF-8 sequence.
I have used Japanese in FHIR resource, so I think this some problem with language.
Could anyone tell me how to fix it? Thanks.
can you send me a sample I can add to the test cases?

hey @xiao dingding - I got to the bottom of this finally - you are using an invalid character in the XML (nothing to do with unicode issues, which wasted plenty of my time). the character u0B is not valid in XML. Once you remove the 6 characters like that from the example you sent me, it will read ok (many other errors)
